biotools.summary:
Inferring Continuous Subjective Ratings With Deep Regression.

Data and code of the BrainLinks-BrainTools NiceBot project, manuscript "Human-Compliant Robot Behavior: Combining Continuous Subjective Evaluation with Multimodal Deep Regression Analysis".
